column4: it worries about success.

text: Best way to deal w executive ego in #coaching is check your own ego first.
Recognize everyone's role in coaching.
Shift the role of the "leader" to that of a team captain. #coaching
The empathy we need to create is both professional and personal.
Our job as leaders is to create an environment of safety to encourage best performance from team.
Yoda: all-wise and trusted person who can call out and encourage candor among people in meeting
Real meeting shouldn't happen after everyone leaves the room.
How does a learning org grow? From the top. Leaders need to identify where they can get better.
Don't use the staff meetings for report outs. Prime time for collaborative problem solving.
How we interact on a day-to-day basis is what creates the change we want to see. #coaching
How we interact on a day-to-day basis is what creates the change we want to see. #coaching
You innovate by co-creation.
The changes we try to make are not of individuals but of relationships.
The #coaching that needs to occur is some subset of the executive team.
